definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-

sentences.english: These are near supernatural powers that may help the Student survive!
sentences.chinese: 他是接近於超自然能力，能夠幫助學生生還。

sentences.english: The hinge of the interaction between falseness and trueness is the supernatural power.
sentences.chinese: 該劇虛實相生的樞紐是超自然力量。

sentences.english: We needed to know whether it was possible to use paranormal forces for military ends.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要知道是否有可能將超自然力量用於軍事目的。

sentences.english: Mobile phones are killing off ghosts, a British expert who has spent years researching the occult said.
sentences.chinese: 一個研究超自然現象多年的英國專家說，手機能驅鬼。

sentences.english: And the ancient remedies are supplications to supernatural spirits or Gods.
sentences.chinese: 古代的辦法即是向超自然之神或上帝祈禱。

sentences.english: I kept the supernatural cast that I’m sure inhabited those dark woods.
sentences.chinese: 我保留了那些肯定是住在幽暗森林中的超自然人物。

sentences.english: I am reading a book about ghosts and other supernatural sightings.
sentences.chinese: 我正在讀的這本書講的是鬼怪和其他一些超自然的事。

sentences.english: Shamans are experts in the supernatural and can interpret dreams.
sentences.chinese: 薩滿教道士是超自然的行家裏手，而且能夠釋夢。

sentences.english: She believed the U.S. Army had genuinely discovered a way of harnessing the paranormal.
sentences.chinese: 她認爲，美軍真正發現了利用超自然力的途徑。

sentences.english: From ancient times supernatural powers have been attributed by astrologers to certain gemstones.
sentences.chinese: 在古代星卜家認爲超自然的力量是由某種寶石造成的。

sentences.english: He heard that unearthly cry upon his failing sense, again and nearer than before.
sentences.chinese: 他聽說後，他沒有感覺超自然的哭，再比以前更接近。

sentences.english: There is a metaphysical approach, too.
sentences.chinese: 這還有一種超自然的解決方法。

sentences.english: A fascinated creature is entranced by a supernatural or spell effect.
sentences.chinese: 著迷狀態是指被超自然能力或是法術能力給迷住了。

sentences.english: The word "dread" refers to trepidation of their supernatural being.
sentences.chinese: 單詞“恐懼”是指他們超自然生命的顫抖。

sentences.english: But the military was not content to use psychics merely to gather intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 但是，軍方並不滿足於僅用超自然力蒐集情報。

sentences.english: Once formulated; a theology evokes in its turn numinous feelings.
sentences.chinese: 神學一旦形成，它反過來就會喚起超自然的感覺。

definition: pantheism, theological theory equating God with the Universe
theism (the belief in the existence of God)
